verbs.description: Elliot Broidy [V: is] said to have received a record - profitable contract from the Pentagon , through his access to President Trump .
[ARG1: Elliot Broidy] is [V: said] [C-ARG1: to have received a record - profitable contract from the Pentagon , through his access to President Trump] .
Elliot Broidy is said to [V: have] received a record - profitable contract from the Pentagon , through his access to President Trump .
[ARG0: Elliot Broidy] is said to have [V: received] [ARG1: a record - profitable contract] [ARG2: from the Pentagon] , [ARGM-MNR: through his access to President Trump] .
